headline: Illinois Tool Works Refreshes $3.0b Credit Line To Support Future Moves
summary: Illinois Tool Works entered into a new five year $3.0 billion revolving credit agreement. The new facility replaces the company’s previous credit arrangement ahead of its original maturity. The agreement includes multi currency features and can be expanded under certain conditions. For investors watching NYSE:ITW, this new $3.0 billion facility sits alongside a share price of $290.63 and a long record of trading in large industrial markets.
